participant_1.background:
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.
I once lost my favorite book, The Alchemist, and I was devastated.
I have been taking care of the children for a long time and they feel like my family.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.
My time is my most valuable possession, so I would not waste it on people who would not accept me for who I am.

participant_2.background:
I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.
I sometimes spend hours watching cooking shows instead of actually cooking.
I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.
i am a woman who wears a size 12.
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but I always come back to my favorite: a big bowl of pasta with marinara sauce.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but I always come back to my favorite: a big bowl of pasta with marinara sauce.
That sounds delicious! I am not much of a cook, I spend most of my free time in my workshop building furniture.
That's really cool! I wish I had more time to do things like that. I usually only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.
I hear ya, I only dress up for work or special occasions. I once lost my favorite book, The Alchemist, and I was devastated.
Oh no! That's terrible. I have a few books that I would be devastated to lose.
Me too! I love books. I have been taking care of the children for a long time and they feel like my family.
That's really nice of you. I love kids, but I don't have any of my own.
I have a few of my own, but they're all grown up now. My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of a ticket the other day.
Good for you! I'm sure your mom would be proud of you.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about yourself?
I'm pretty good at making people laugh.
That's a great quality to have! I think my time is my most valuable possession
